select ri.id, ri.student_id, ri.exam_id, ri.score, ri.remark, ri.end_date, si.name as studentName, si.images as studentImages, epi.exampaper_name from record_info ri left join student_info si on (si.id = ri.student_id) left join exam_paper_info epi on (epi.id = ri.exam_id) where 1 = 1
AND si.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{recordInfo.studentName},'%')
AND epi.exampaper_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{recordInfo.exampaperName},'%')
order by ri.end_date desc
